title: PLDM Event Log PDR (DSP0248 Type 19)
description: Per DSP0248 v1.3.0 Clause 28.21 and DSP0240 v1.2.0 Section 2.5

PDRType.description: uint8; PDR Type 19 = PLDM Event Log

dataLength.description: uint16; Length of data following this header (calculated automatically).

logSize.description: uint32; The size in bytes of the log storage area that is used for storing log entries. Special values: 0 = unspecified, 0xFFFFFFFE = reserved, 0xFFFFFFFF = log size >= 4GB-1 bytes.

supportedLogClearingPolicies.description: uint8 bitfield; [7:3] reserved, [2] = 1b if clearOnAge supported, [1] = 1b if FIFO supported, [0] = 1b if fillAndStop supported.

entryIDTimeout.description: uint8; The minimum interval, in seconds, that the entryID used in the middle of a partial transfer remains valid. Special values: 0 = no timeout, 1 = default minimum timeout (same as PDR Handle Timeout, MC1), 0xFF = timeout >254 seconds.

perEntryOverhead.description: uint8; The number of bytes of storage overhead per entry if counted as using space from logSize. Special value: 0xFF = unspecified.

allocationGranularity.description: uint8; The byte multiple or increment by which storage space is allocated to entries. Special value: 0xFF = unspecified.

percentUsedResolution.description: uint8; Indicates the resolution of the storagePercentUsed value from GetPLDMEventLogInfo. Values 1 to 100; others reserved.
